entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 70%
